description: Welcome to Essence in the heart of Mount Pleasant. Meticulously maintained corner Townhome with 1,441 sq. ft. of modern living space. The open-concept main floor features engineered hardwood, a bright living room and a contemporary kitchen with quartz countertops and custom cabinets. Upstairs, enjoy your large primary bedroom with ample closet space and a beautifully remodelled en suite bathroom. Two separate outdoor spaces with one just off your living space that is perfect for entertaining and a top floor patio to enjoy the view. Fantastic location just steps to some of the best shopping and restaurants in the city.
